comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/71.35.194.30|71.35.194.30]] ([[User talk:71.35.194.30|talk]]) to last revision by HitroMilanese ([[WP:HG|HG]])

diff.*:
Line 18: Line 18:  
This does not exclude the possibility of destruction if it is necessary and if it does not take place as the result of intentional malice. If, for example, there is the threat of physical conflict and one has no other solution, it is acceptable to cause the necessary extent of injury, out of self-defence. Thus ethics does not provide rules like [[morals]] but it can be used as a means to determine moral values (''attitudes or behaviours giving priority to social values, e.g. ethics or morals'').<ref>{{cite web|last=Andre|first=Claire|title=What is Ethics?|url=http://www.scu.edu/ethics/practicing/decision/whatisethics.html|publisher=Santa Clara University|accessdate=2013-10-21}}</ref>
 
This does not exclude the possibility of destruction if it is necessary and if it does not take place as the result of intentional malice. If, for example, there is the threat of physical conflict and one has no other solution, it is acceptable to cause the necessary extent of injury, out of self-defence. Thus ethics does not provide rules like [[morals]] but it can be used as a means to determine moral values (''attitudes or behaviours giving priority to social values, e.g. ethics or morals'').<ref>{{cite web|last=Andre|first=Claire|title=What is Ethics?|url=http://www.scu.edu/ethics/practicing/decision/whatisethics.html|publisher=Santa Clara University|accessdate=2013-10-21}}</ref>

==META PORNPHASUS==
+
==Meta-ethics==
 
{{Main|Meta-ethics}}
 
{{Main|Meta-ethics}}
 
Meta-ethics is a field within philosophy that seeks to understand the nature of [[normative ethics]]. The focus of meta-ethics is on how we understand, know about, and what we mean when we talk about what is right and what is wrong.
 
Meta-ethics is a field within philosophy that seeks to understand the nature of [[normative ethics]]. The focus of meta-ethics is on how we understand, know about, and what we mean when we talk about what is right and what is wrong.
